医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
治疗的创新组合有效地杀死了急性髓性白血病细胞VCU Massey综合癌症中心的科学家已经确定了治疗策略的创新组合，这些策略合作有效地杀死了急性髓性白血病（AML）细胞，这是一种常常无法治愈的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/innovative-combination-of--wareatments-treatments-treatments-trectivevility-kills-kills-ucute-myeloid-leukemia-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/innovative-combination-of--wareatments-wareatments-treatments-trective--kills-kills-ucute-myeloid-leukemia-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6881dc97-0731-431-43bf-8ead-04f2333333db0f8d Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:45:42 -0500 Innovative combination of treatments effectively kills acute myeloid leukemia cells
与肺部损伤和呼吸道疾病有关的生物质烟雾化合物生物量燃烧 - 无论是野火，木炉或农业火灾都将大量的微小颗粒和化学物质引入空气中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/biomass-smoke-compounds-linked-to-lung-damage-and-respiratory-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/biomass-smoke-compounds-linked-to-lung-damage-and-damage-and-respiratory-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be591f22-65d8-4379-4379-87f9-42f9-42fbdbc58cd8 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:34:47 -0500 Biomass smoke compounds linked to lung damage and respiratory diseases
研究重点增加了VZV诱导的中枢神经系统感染和痴呆症风险日本富士卫生大学的研究人员观察到成人中枢神经系统（CNS）感染的增加，这主要是由水痘带状疱疹病毒（VZV）引起的无菌性脑膜炎，2019年后。研究人员强调了潜水员疫苗接种减少中枢神经系统感染的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-highlights-increase-in--in-vzv-诱导cnsins-infections-infections-infections-and-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-highlights-increase-in-crease-in-vzv-诱导cns-insins-infections-infections-and-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96c41597-a73d-432d-b94c-4f4c-4f4c4c4c4ed7b64e Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:22:27 -0500 Study highlights increase in VZV-induced CNS infections and dementia risk
研究揭开了结直肠癌风险与脂肪肝疾病之间的联系酒精和非酒精性脂肪肝疾病（NAFLD）是结直肠癌（CRC）的众所周知的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-unravels-the-link-bet-colororectal-colorectal-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-canc------- -y---- steatotic-liver-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-unravels-the-link-bet--colororectal-colorectal-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-inc-------------er-steatotic-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b0eef65-d765-4733-b0ef-fb69be0fbbe8 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:13:21 -0500 Study unravels the link between colorectal cancer risk and steatotic liver disease
幼儿大流行期间迅速适应新的社会规范Covid-19的大流行对生活的各个方面都有重大而突然的影响，要求儿童及其家人迅速改变习惯并采取新的行为以保持健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/young-children-rapidly-apapt-to-new-social-norms-norms-during-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/young-children-rapidly-apapt-to-new-social-norms-norms-dring-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=821a4d62-4074-4734-4734-a97b-497b-49f3618d09b6 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 12:06:09 -0500 Young children rapidly adapt to new social norms during the pandemic
新研究确定了减少可卡因寻求可卡因行为的脑电路钥匙想象一下，可以放松可卡因使用障碍的抓地力，渴望逐渐消失的未来以及复发减少的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-study-indistifies-brain-circuit-key-to-redecing-cocaine-cocaine-seeking-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-study-indiseifies-brain-circuit-circuit-key-to-reducing-cocaine-seeking-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e17​​aae7aae7f-c992-487b-865a-77ba-77ba1082d0cc Thu, 27 Feb 2025 11:42:00 -0500 New study identifies brain circuit key to reducing cocaine-seeking behavior
巨噬细胞使用细菌来建立重要的营养并控制炎症根据科罗拉多州Anschutz Medical Campus的一项新研究，在体内吃细菌的免疫细胞不会像曾经想到的那样将它们藏在专门的隔间中，而是将它们变成关键的营养素，这些营养素会产生蛋白质，创造能量并保持细胞的活力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/macrophages-use-bacteria-to-bacteria-to-build-wital-nutrients-and-nutrients-and-control-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/macrophages-use-bacteria-to-bacteria-to-build-withitar-nutrients-and-nutrients-and-control-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdec8EA4-3048-48A2-9012-5542767DE4B0 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 11:29:45 -0500 Macrophages use bacteria to build vital nutrients and control inflammation
全球伙伴关系改变稀有遗传疾病的诊断和治疗一份新报告称，将科学研究嵌入临床护理中的全球伙伴关系正在彻底改变罕见遗传疾病儿童的诊断和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/global-partnerships-transforming-diarmentosing-dingnosis-and-warreatment-for-rare ger-rare-genetic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/global-partnerships-transforming-dingnosis-and-warreatment-for-rare-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cfc9117-D2B9-4C80-A94D-7C8EB44454F41 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 11:24:43 -0500 Global partnerships transforming diagnosis and treatment for rare genetic diseases
鼻喷雾剂可能会给脑外伤患者提供新的希望弥撒将军杨百翰研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，有一天，为靶向神经炎症而开发的鼻喷雾可能是对创伤性脑损伤（TBI）的有效治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/nasal-spray-may-offer-new-new-hope-for-for-traumatic-brain-brain-injury-injury-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/nasal-spray-may-offer-new-new-hope-for-for-traumatic-brain-brain-injury-injury-injury-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A7831A1B-CD12-4579-999C-D152891EA462 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 11:08:05 -0500 Nasal spray may offer new hope for traumatic brain injury patients
Labgenius Therapeutics任命三名专家为科学顾问团队Labgenius Therapeutics开创性治疗抗体优化，利用先进的技术来改善药物发育和临床翻译。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/labgenius-therapeutics-therapeutics-appoints-three-experts-three-experts-to-cientific-advisors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/labgenius-therapeutics-therapeutics-appoints-three-experts-experts-experts-to-cientific-advisors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03B33764-CBA7-413E-9943-6F37EF79DE35 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 09:32:00 -0500 LabGenius Therapeutics appoints three experts to its team of scientific advisors
